location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Map showing tribes and new boundary of the Aden Protectorate'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paper with manuscript additions in coloured ink.Dimensions: 520 x 670

mods.abstract: Map showing territories surrounding the Aden Protectorate, with indications of tribes and sub-tribes. The Protectorate boundary and the tribal boundaries within the Protectorate area are in red ink. The map indicates settlements, hydrology and provides some indication of relief.The map was printed by the War Office and includes a printing statement which reads 'Topographical Section, General Staff N. 2124'.
